moves.1. e4: This game shows my lack of opening, at least classic openning. A Clasic move that will lead to the fate of the game to the opponent
moves.2. Nf3 Nc6 3. d4 cxd4 4. Nxd4 e5: A surprise for me, is just like I would play
moves.5. Nb3: And this is the sort of error that I had in mind. Better would be Nb5 or Nf5. The subsecuent moves would proove it.
moves.5... Nf6 6. Nc3 Bb4 7. Bg5 Bxc3+ 8. bxc3: Forced otherwise a bad pawn structure weak position and being under by a pawn will devastate me.
moves.11... Be6 12. Rd1: Now I have to show my intention, If 12Bxe6 thenQxe6 Rd1 Rd8 0-0 0-0 His Queen position spins my Knight and allows f5.
moves.12... Bxc4 13. Qxc4 O-O 14. O-O: If to attack must defend well
moves.15. Rd3: This is awsome, it attacks and it defends now Nd4 is not posible not loosing some pawns
moves.15... Nd4: Here Black sacrifice a pawn for the initiative, I accept the offer or as well had no other choice
moves.20... Qh5: This trheatens Qf3 , Not Kg2 because Nf4 !, gxf4 and Qg4-f3 draws!
